thread.title: 'A great opportunity': Milwaukee restaurant excited for March Madness
thread.title_full: 'A great opportunity': Milwaukee restaurant excited for March Madness

author: Erica Finke
title: 'A great opportunity': Milwaukee restaurant excited for March Madness
text:
'A great opportunity': Milwaukee restaurant excited for March Madness at Fiserv Forum
As Fiserv Forum gets prepped for March Madness, Mader's German restaurant prepares its staff for the 19,000 fans coming to Milwaukee.
As Fiserv Forum gets prepped for March Madness, Mader's German restaurant prepares its staff for the 19,000 fans coming to Milwaukee.
As Fiserv Forum gets prepped for March Madness, Mader's German restaurant prepares its staff for the 19,000 fans coming to Milwaukee.
From the changing court panels inside Fiserv Forum to the NCAA banners going up in the Deer District, March Madness is in Milwaukee.
Buses for the Ole Miss Rebels and Kentucky Wildcats were already parked in downtown Milwaukee Wednesday.
Mader's German Restaurant at Doctor M.L.K. Jr. Drive and Highland Avenue — just around the corner from Fiserv Forum — is preparing for the long basketball weekend with extra servers.
"It's going to be a really fun weekend. We have a lot of people coming in town," said Mader's banquet manager, Ben Stilp. "This event is going to be expecting about 19,000 attendees. There is also a volleyball conference going over at Baird Center. It's going to bring in about 16,000 people, so a lot of people in the area."
Stilp said they're also opening their upstairs seating area, which increases the restaurant's capacity from 250 to 350 people.
"I think the most exciting part is all of the different people that we're going to be seeing. I mean, the teams are coming from all over the country. It's just a great opportunity to get the German culture out there for people and, of course, a lot of delicious German food."
If you buy a meal at Mader's, you can access its parking lot. You will have to show your receipt to the valet, and your parking will be covered for your session.
